about_the_game:
Eden: Project New Earth lets you experience the adventure your way – in single-player or multiplayer mode. Play locally or on servers, with friends or strangers, together in PvE or against one another in PvP. Form alliances, build communities with others, or defend yourself against hostile adversaries. Transform from a bare clone of yourself into a pioneer, rediscovering technology and adapting it to the challenges of an unknown planet.

Explore the remnants of an ancient civilization and uncover the secrets hidden within its ruins, caves, and dungeons. Discover their history, learn what happened to them – and find out how their technologies might become the key to your survival.

You’ve been chosen to secure humanity’s survival in a new star system. But this new planet is as dangerous as it is full of potential. While Earth was left in chaos, your mission is to colonize and sustainably manage this world – to succeed where Earth failed.

Survive a Merciless World

Quickly find shelter and familiarize yourself with the planet’s conditions. But survival isn’t as simple as finding food and water. You’ll need to maintain a balanced diet, ensuring your body has the right levels of vitamins and minerals to thrive. Not everything that looks edible is safe. Some plants or fruits might weaken you – or worse, make you sick.

Diseases and New Challenges

The planet doesn’t just threaten you with visible dangers like aggressive wildlife or harsh weather but also with invisible threats: diseases. Unfamiliar viruses, parasites, or bacterial infections may endanger your health. You’ll need to discover cures by studying the local flora and fauna or developing new technologies. But beware – some diseases can spread to your companions or community, adding yet another layer of difficulty to your survival.

Extreme Weather and Natural Disasters

The planet’s weather is unpredictable and unforgiving. Violent storms, scorching heat, freezing temperatures, or toxic rainfall could strike at any moment. Prepare well and design your base to withstand even the most brutal conditions. Thoughtful planning and forward-thinking construction will be the key to surviving these environmental challenges.

Encounters with Fauna

Not everything that moves on this planet is your friend. The predators you hunt may also see you as prey. However, some creatures can be tamed if approached carefully. Train them to serve as loyal companions or even mounts. But stay vigilant – the planet’s wildlife is diverse and often deadly.

Build and Optimize Your Home

Protect yourself from harsh environmental conditions by building a base that’s as safe as it is efficient. Take advantage of an innovative construction system that allows you to place blueprints without consuming resources. Only when everything is perfectly planned will materials be used. This lets you build smarter and more sustainably while avoiding costly mistakes.

A Deep and Evolving Story

As you explore the planet, you’ll encounter fragments of its past. Who once lived here? What led to their downfall? And how does it all connect to your mission? As you progress, you’ll uncover the true story of the planet and gain insight into why you were chosen for this expedition.

short_description: Eden: Project New Earth is a survival game where you can play solo or in multiplayer to colonize a mysterious planet, uncover ancient secrets, and face extreme dangers. Secure humanity’s future through strategy, exploration, and smart base building.
